official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States to the Farm Bureau of Halifax County, North Carolina.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral rights of the United States to the Farm Bureau of Halifax County, North Carolina.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States to the Farm Bureau of Halifax County, North Carolina.
